tool.name: Feature Extraction for named entities
tool.help:
Delimited File Generator =====================================
**What it does**
Generates TAB or COMMA delimited files that can be used in machine learning applications.
**Required annotations**
#. `Token <http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/Token>`_ #. `POS <http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/Token#pos>`_ #. `NamedEntity <http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/NamedEntity>`_
**Generated Annotations**
# None.
**Notes**
**License**
